name: Cheddar Potato Slices
ingredients: 4 med. potatoes, cut into 1/4 â€œ slices
instructions: In small bowl combine soup, paprika and pepper.
In greased 2 qt. dish arrange potatoes in overlapping rows.
Sprinkle with cheese; spoon soup mix over cheese.
Uncover; bake 10 minutes or until potatoes are fork tender.
